title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example exhibits excessive flashing when resizing the window vertically. This issue affects all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
OB: When running the Control Example, resize the window only in the vertical direction and observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.
EB: When running the Control Example, resizing the window vertically should not cause excessive flashing of all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames.
SR:
1. Open the Control Example
2. Resize the window vertically only
